name: cli (entireio)
description: [项目级] Entire is a new developer platform that hooks into your git workflow to capture AI agent sessions on every push, unifying your code with its context and reasoning.。来源: https://github.com/entireio/cli

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Entire is a new developer platform that hooks into your git workflow to capture AI agent sessions on every push, unifying your code with its context and reasoning.

来源: https://github.com/entireio/cli
语言: Go
Stars: 2778
